name: Please Mamma
description:
Controls:
- Down Arrow: Crouch.
- Space Bar: Jump.

Engine: Unity 5.
Ugly Graphics: Paint.NET, Photoshop.
Music: Guitar Pro.

You arrive home at 3:00 o'clock and your mother is waiting with a little surprise.

The game does not last more than five minutes but we learned a lot thanks to the LD34. Sorry for bugs. <3

If you like the game Visit our Ludum Dare 34 and vote for us.

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=56356


-Credits-
Music and Graphics: @Argenis_Vi
Programing and UGLY graphics: @nlbi21

Bug Fixes (19/12/2015):
- Balancing timers projectiles.
- Balancing speed projectiles.
- Problem with jump and crouch.
- At level 3 visual bug.
- Buff player objects, were not displayed correctly.
- Error in translation, distancia to distance.
